Question:
Canje-canjen da ke sa achondroplasia suna da tasiri da za a iya kwatanta kamar:
A.abin da ba shi da kyau.
B.samun-da-aiki.
C.haploinsufficiency.
D.rashin aiki.
GivenAnswer:
canje-canjen da ke sa achondroplasia suna da tasiri da za a iya kwatanta kamar **b. samun-da-aiki** (gain-of-function).

achondroplasia, wanda shine mafi yawan dalilin dwarfism, ana samunsa ne ta hanyar canje-canje a cikin fgfr3 gene (fibroblast growth factor receptor 3). wannan gene yana taka rawa wajen sarrafa girman kasusuwa ta hanyar rage yaduwar kwayoyin halitta da ke cikin cartilage da zasu zama kasusuwa. mutanen da ke da achondroplasia suna da sigar fgfr3 gene da ke aiki da yawa, wanda ke haifar da "samun-da-aiki" na protein da gene ke samarwa. wannan yawan aiki yana hana girman kasusuwa yadda ya kamata, wanda ke haifar da gajarta da sauran alamun achondroplasia. 

sauran zaɓuɓɓukan da aka bayar:
- a. abin da ba shi da kyau: wannan ba daidai bane domin achondroplasia ba sakamakon rashin wani abu bane amma sakamakon yawan aiki na fgfr3.
- c. haploinsufficiency: wannan yanayi ne inda rashi ko raguwar aiki na daya daga cikin kwafi na gene ya haifar da rashin lafiya. ba haka lamarin yake ba a achondroplasia.
- d. rashin aiki: wannan kuma ba daidai bane domin achondroplasia ba sakamakon rashin aiki na fgfr3 bane, amma sakamakon yawan aikinsa.

Question:
Ka tsai da shawarar H+(aq) mai da hankali a 1.0 M phenol, C6H5OH, magance. (Ka for phenol ne 1 × 10 ~-10.)
A.1 × 10-10 M
B.1 × 10-9 M
C.1 × 10-3 M
D.1 × 10=-5 M
GivenAnswer:
don nemo maida hankali na h+(aq) a cikin 1.0 m phenol, zamu yi amfani da ka, wanda shine ma'aunin dissociation na acid. an bayar da ka na phenol a matsayin 1 × 10^-10.

ka = [h+][a-]/[ha]

inda:
- ka shine ma'aunin dissociation na acid.
- [h+] shine maida hankali na hydrogen ion.
- [a-] shine maida hankali na anion bayan dissociation.
- [ha] shine maida hankali na acid kafin dissociation.

tunda muka fara da 1.0 m na phenol kuma muka san cewa dissociation din sa bai cika ba, za mu iya dauka cewa canjin maida hankali na h+ (wanda kuma shine canjin maida hankali na a- saboda kowane molecule na ha da ya dissociate ya samar da daya h+ da daya a-) zai zama x, inda x yake karami sosai idan aka kwatanta da 1.0 m. saboda haka, [ha] zai zama kusan 1.0 m bayan dissociation (saboda x karami ne).

ka = x^2 / (1.0 - x) ≈ x^2 / 1.0 (saboda x karami ne)

muna da ka = 1 × 10^-10 = x^2 / 1.0

don haka, x^2 = 1 × 10^-10

x = √(1 × 10^-10) = 1 × 10^-5

don haka, maida hankali na h+(aq) a cikin 1.0 m phenol zai zama 1 × 10^-5 m, wanda ya dace da zaɓi d.

Question:
K-fold cross-ƙwararrun
A.A cikin K
B.2018 A K
C.kubu a K
D.a cikin K
GivenAnswer:
daga cikin zaɓuɓɓukan da aka bayar, yana da alama kuna magana ne game da "k-fold cross-validation," wani muhimmin tsari a fagen koyon na'ura da kimar samfuri. bari mu gyara kuma mu bayyana kowanne daga cikin zaɓuɓɓukan da aka bayar a cikin wannan mahallin:

a. a cikin k - wannan ba ya bayyana wani abu takamaimai game da k-fold cross-validation. k-fold cross-validation yana raba bayanan zuwa k ɓangarori ko "folds," inda a kowane zagaye, ɓangare ɗaya yake aiki a matsayin saitin gwaji kuma sauran k-1 ɓangarorin a matsayin saitin horo.

b. 2018 a k - wannan kuma ba shi da alaƙa kai tsaye da k-fold cross-validation. shekarar 2018 ba ta da wata mahimmanci a cikin bayanin yadda k-fold cross-validation ke aiki.

c. kubu a k - wannan zaɓin ba shi da ma'ana a cikin mahallin k-fold cross-validation. kalmar "kubu" ba ta da alaƙa da tsarin ko ka'idar k-fold cross-validation.

d. a cikin k - kamar a, wannan ba ya bayar da bayani mai amfani ko daidai game da k-fold cross-validation.

k-fold cross-validation ainihin hanya ce ta kimar samfurin da ke taimakawa wajen rage matsalar overfitting ta hanyar tabbatar da cewa samfurin yana da kyakkyawan aiki ba kawai akan bayanan da aka horar da shi ba, har ma da bayanan da ba a gani ba. a cikin k-fold cross-validation, ana raba bayanan zuwa k ɓangarori ko "folds" na daidaito. a kowane zagaye na validation, ɗaya daga cikin folds ɗin yana aiki a matsayin saitin gwaji kuma sauran k-1 folds ɗin a matsayin saitin horo. wannan tsarin yana maimaitawa k sau, tare da kowane ɗayan folds yana aiki a matsayin saitin gwaji akalla sau ɗaya. a ƙarshe, auna aikin samfurin ta hanyar lissafin matsakaicin aikin samfurin a kan k zagayowar.

don haka, babu ɗaya daga cikin zaɓuɓɓukan da aka bayar da ke bayyana k-fold cross-validation daidai. mafi kusa da bayani mai amfani ko daidai zai kasance wani bayanin da ke cikin mahallin yadda ake raba bayanai zuwa k ɓangarori da yadda ake amfani da su don horo da gwaji a cikin tsarin k-fold cross-validation.

amma, an bayar da bayanai game da "tsawon wuri a ƙasa ta uku" ba tare da bayyana ko wannan shine diamita ko kuma radius na tankin ba, wanda yake da muhimmanci don lissafin yankin fadin ƙasa. tunda ba a bayyana karara ba, zamu iya ɗauka cewa wannan tsawon na iya nufin diamita na tankin don sauƙaƙe lissafin.

idan 116 ƙafa shine diamita, to radius zai kasance rabin wannan, wato 116/2 = 58 ƙafa.

yanzu, za mu iya amfani da formula don ƙididdige yawan ruwan da tankin zai ɗauka, wanda shine yankin fadin ƙasa (πr^2) sau tsawon tankin (h).

\[ \text{volume} = \pi r^2 h \]

\[ \text{volume} = \pi (58)^2 (30) \]

\[ \text{volume} = \pi (3364) (30) \]

\[ \text{volume} = \pi (100920) \]

\[ \text{volume} ≈ 3.1416 \times 100920 \]

\[ \text{volume} ≈ 316,857.536 \text{ ft}^3 \]

wannan sakamakon bai dace da kowace zaɓi da aka bayar ba, wanda ke nuna cewa akwai kuskure a fahimtar tambayar ko kuma a lissafin da aka yi. bari mu sake dubawa:

idan muka yi la'akari da cewa an yi kuskure a lissafin, kuma abin da ake nema shi ne amsar da ta fi kusa da zaɓuɓɓukan da aka bayar, za mu iya sake duba lissafinmu. duk da haka, lissafin da aka yi ya dogara ne akan fahimtar cewa 116 ƙafa shine diamita, kuma an yi amfani da shi don ƙididdige yankin fadin ƙasa na silinda.

Question:

wannan magana ƙarya ce. ba za a iya cewa (ab) = n yana nufin a = n ko b = n ba tare da ƙarin bayani ba. a cikin rukunin aljabar, a, b, da n na iya wakiltar abubuwa daban-daban na rukunin, kuma babu wata doka da ta ce a = n ko b = n kawai saboda (ab) = n. wannan maganar ba ta da tushe a cikin ka'idodin rukunin aljabar.

Question:
The kwantum aiki na photon gano ne 0.1. Idan an aika photon 100 cikin mai ganin, ɗaya bayan ɗaya, mai ganin zai gano photons
A.10 sau da yawa, tare da rms ya ɓace kusan 4.
B.10 sau da yawa, tare da rms ya ɓace kusan 3
C.10 sau da yawa, tare da rms ya ɓace kusan 1
D.A kusan sau goma, da ƙarfin
GivenAnswer:
amsar ita ce a. 10 sau da yawa, tare da rms ya ɓace kusan 4.

bari mu yi bayani dalla-dalla:

an ce kwantum aiki na photon gano ne 0.1. wannan yana nufin cewa, a kowane lokaci da aka aika photon zuwa ga mai ganin, akwai kashi 10% (0.1) damar cewa photon din zai yi tasiri kuma a gane shi. idan an aika photons 100, zamu iya tsammanin ganin photons 10 a matsakaicin (0.1 x 100 = 10) saboda kowanne daga cikin su yana da damar 10% na a gan shi.

rms (root mean square) na ɓacewa yana da alaƙa da bambancin binomial, wanda a wannan yanayin yana nufin bambancin tsakanin yawan photons da ake tsammani a gano da kuma yawan da a zahiri aka gano. a cikin tsarin binomial, bambancin (σ²) ana lissafa shi da σ² = np(1-p), inda n shine yawan gwaje-gwajen (a wannan yanayin, 100 photons), p shine damar nasara (a wannan yanayin, 0.1 ko 10%), kuma (1-p) ita ce damar rashin nasara (wato, 0.9 ko 90%).

don haka, bambancin zai zama σ² = 100 * 0.1 * 0.9 = 9.

rms, ko ƙimar daidaito, ita ce tushen murabba'in bambancin, wato, σ = √σ² = √9 = 3.

saboda haka, da alama akwai kuskure a cikin zaɓin amsoshin da aka bayar. a bisa bayanin da aka yi, amsar da ta fi dacewa da bayanin da aka bayar ita ce za a gano photons 10 sau da yawa, tare da rms ya ɓace kusan 3, wanda ya sa amsar da ta dace ita ce b. 10 sau da yawa, tare da rms ya ɓace kusan 3.

Question:
Ka nemi tsawon kallon y = ln x tsakanin wurare inda y = 1/2 da y = 1.
A.0.53
B.0.86
C.1.18
D.1.36
GivenAnswer:
don nemo tsawon kallon y = ln x tsakanin wurare inda y = 1/2 da y = 1, za mu fara da nemo iyakokin x don waɗannan darajojin y.

da farko, mu saita y = 1/2:
\[ y = \ln(x) \]
\[ 1/2 = \ln(x) \]
don nemo x, muna amfani da asalin ln wato e:
\[ x = e^{1/2} \]
\[ x = \sqrt{e} \]

sannan, mu saita y = 1:
\[ y = \ln(x) \]
\[ 1 = \ln(x) \]
\[ x = e^1 \]
\[ x = e \]

yanzu, muna da iyakokin x: daga \(\sqrt{e}\) zuwa \(e\).

tsawon kallon, \(l\), na iya zama ana lissafin sa ta amfani da integral na farko na aikin tare da iyakokin da aka samu. amma a wannan yanayin, an tambaya ne kawai game da iyakokin x ba tare da buƙatar lissafin tsawon kallon ba ta hanyar integral. don haka, abin da ake buƙata shi ne kawai fahimtar yadda ake samun iyakokin x don waɗannan darajojin y.

duk da haka, idan an fahimci tambayar a matsayin neman auna tsawon kai tsaye tsakanin waɗannan iyakokin na x a kan layin y = ln(x), to, akwai yiwuwar an yi kuskure a fahimtar tambayar. aikin da aka bayar ("nemi tsawon kallon") na iya nufin auna tsawon arc na curve, wanda za a buƙaci lissafin integral don aikin layi don curve din. wannan ya fi rikitarwa kuma ba a bayar da bayanai don yin wannan lissafin ba a cikin tambayar.

don haka, bisa ga bayanin da aka bayar, zai yiwu an samu rudani a cikin fahimtar tambayar. idan an nufi auna tsawon arc na curve tsakanin waɗannan darajojin na y, to, amsar ba ta cikin zaɓuɓɓukan da aka bayar ba tare da yin lissafin da ya dace ba. amsar daidai za ta buƙaci amfani da ƙa'idar tsawon arc, wanda ke buƙatar lissafi na integral wanda ba a yi ba a nan.

Question:

GivenAnswer:

daga yadda aka bayyana shirin, an nuna cewa an yi niyyar lissafin jimlar alƙaluman da ke cikin jerin numlist. koyaya, ba a bayar da cikakken bayani game da yadda aka yi amfani da variables 'kuɗi' da 'tamani' ba, ko kuma yadda aka fara su. idan muka dauka cewa 'kuɗi' yana nufin jimlar da ake so a ƙarshe kuma 'tamani' yana nufin kowane darajar da ke cikin jerin, to akwai buƙatar a fara 'kuɗi' da 0 kafin fara lissafin. kuma, idan an yi haka daidai, to lissafin jimlar [0, 1, 4, 5] zai zama 0 + 1 + 4 + 5 = 10, wanda ya dace da abin da aka bayar a matsayin sakamakon gwajin. amma, tunda ba a bayyana yadda aka yi amfani da 'kuɗi' da 'tamani' ba da kuma yadda aka fara su ba, ba za mu iya tabbatar da cewa kammalawar ta dace ba tare da ƙarin bayani ba.

hakazalika, tambayar ta ƙunshi wasu zaɓuɓɓuka waɗanda ke magana game da ingancin gwajin da aka yi amfani da shi don tabbatar da shirin. duk da cewa gwajin gwaji [0, 1, 4, 5] ya nuna cewa shirin zai iya lissafin jimlar jerin alƙaluma masu ƙaruwa, ba ya nufin cewa shirin ba shi da kurakurai ko yana aiki daidai a kowane yanayi. don haka, amsar da ta fi dacewa dangane da bayanin da aka bayar ita ce b, tunda ba mu da cikakken bayani game da yadda 'kuɗi' da 'tamani' suke aiki a cikin shirin, kuma an yi zato cewa shirin ba ya nuna darajar da ta dace bisa ga bayanin da aka bayar.

Question:
A cikin xy-plane, da graph of x ~ (log y) = y~ log x ne
A.na farko quadrant
B.Wani mai rufe
C.Ray a cikin 1000 na farko
D.wani abu guda
GivenAnswer:
domin fahimtar wannan tambaya, bari mu fara da fassara abin da aka tambaya:

an tambaya game da siffar daidaiton \(x \cdot (\log y) = y \cdot \log x\) a cikin xy-plane.

domin mu samu amsar wannan tambaya, mu fara da duba yanayin daidaiton:

1. **yanayin daidaiton:** daidaiton \(x \cdot (\log y) = y \cdot \log x\) na iya zama da wuya a zana kai tsaye ba tare da taimakon calculator ko software na zane ba. amma, za mu iya amfani da wasu dabaru na lissafi don fahimtar siffofin daidaiton.

2. **musayar matsayin x da y:** idan muka yi la'akari da cewa logaridm na iya zama na kowanne tushe (misali, tushe 10 ko e), za mu iya ganin cewa daidaiton yana da irin wannan tsari ga x da y. wannan yana nufin cewa akwai wata irin daidaituwa ko daidaito tsakanin x da y a wannan daidaiton.

3. **duba yanayin x=0 ko y=0:** domin x da y su kasance a cikin logaridm, dole ne su kasance masu daraja fiye da sifili. wannan yana nufin cewa ba za mu iya samun x ko y daidai da sifili ba, saboda logaridm na sifili ba shi da ma'ana a lissafi.

4. **quadrant:** tunda x da y dole ne su kasance masu daraja fiye da sifili domin daidaiton ya yi aiki, wannan yana nufin cewa graph din zai kasance ne kawai a cikin farko quadrant, inda duka x da y suke da daraja mai kyau.

saboda haka, amsar ita ce:

a. na farko quadrant

wannan yana nufin cewa graph din daidaiton \(x \cdot (\log y) = y \cdot \log x\) zai kasance ne kawai a cikin farko quadrant na xy-plane, inda duka x da y suke da daraja mai kyau.

Question:

Question:
Wannan shari'ar tana da doka ta laifi da ke gaba: "Mutum ba shi da hakkin yin laifi idan a lokacin irin wannan halin, saboda ciwon hankali ko laifi, ba shi da ƙarfin fahimtar rashin adalci na halinsa, ko kuma ya bi halinsa da farillai na doka. " Wata rana da yamma, wani mai laifi yana kula da ƙanwarsa ɗan shekara biyar. Yayin da suke buga ƙwallon a waje, mai laifi ya jefa ƙwallon bisa kan ƙanwarsa, sai ya juya cikin titi. Ɗan'uwan ya bi ƙwallon amma ya yi tuntuɓe a kan ƙofar kuma ya faɗi a kan titi. Sa'ad da ya yi tuntuɓe, ɗan'uwan ya ƙwace ƙahonsa sosai kuma bai iya tashi ba. Bayan wani lokaci, wani babban kamfani na kunya ya zo ya yi gudu ya kai wa ɗan'uwan, ya kashe shi. Ko da yake mai laifi ya ga yanayin ƙanwarsa, bai yi ƙoƙari ya ceci shi ba. Bayan haka, an yi wa wanda aka ɗauki alamu zargin kashe mutum ba da son rai ba. Sa'ad da ake shari'ar, wanda aka ɗauki alamu ya ba da shaida cewa ya yi mamaki sosai sa'ad da ya ga ɗan'uwansa ya faɗi kusa da mota da ake karɓan kuturta har ya yi sanyi kuma bai iya tafiya ba sai ya ɗan daɗe. Bayan shaidar wanda aka ɗauki alamu, wani gwanin shaida ya ba da shaida don ya ba da shaida cewa irin aikatawar da mai laifi ya kwatanta ba abin ban mamaki ba ne sa'ad da wani aukuwa mai ban mamaki ya faru. Idan rukunin ya gaskata da shaidar mai laifi da kuma shaidarsa mai ƙwarewa, kāriya mafi kyau na mai laifi ita ce wane cikin waɗannan?
A.Mai zargin yana shan wahala na ɗan lokaci.
B.Mai laifi ba shi da halin tunani da ake bukata don yin laifi.
C.Rashin ɗaukan mataki da mai laifi ya yi ba da son rai ba ne.
D.Ɗan direban ne ya ɗauki laifofinsa.
GivenAnswer:
b. mai laifi ba shi da halin tunani da ake bukata don yin laifi.

wannan kariya ta dogara ne akan bayanin da aka bayar cewa mai laifi ya yi mamaki sosai bayan ganin ɗan'uwansa ya faɗi kuma ya yi sanyi, wanda hakan ya sa shi ba zai iya ɗaukar mataki ba. idan rukunin ya gaskata cewa wannan mamakin ya hana shi fahimtar rashin adalci na rashin ɗaukar mataki ko kuma ya hana shi biyan bukatun doka na ceton ɗan'uwansa, to wannan zai iya zama tushe na cewa a lokacin, mai laifi ba shi da "ƙarfin fahimtar rashin adalci na halinsa" ko kuma ba shi da "ƙarfin biyan farillai na doka" saboda yanayin tunaninsa a lokacin. wannan ya bambanta da zargin cewa mai laifi yana cikin wani yanayi na ɗan lokaci wanda ya shafi lafiyar kwakwalwa (a), ko kuma cewa rashin ɗaukan mataki ba da son rai ba ne (c), ko kuma cewa direban ne ke da alhakin (d).

Question:

Question:
Wane cikin waɗannan abubuwan ne gaskiya ne game da hypothyroidism?

GivenAnswer:
c. tsh da aka ɗaukaka

hypothyroidism, wanda kuma ake kira da rashin aikin thyroid, yana faruwa ne lokacin da gland din thyroid baya samar da isassun hormones. wannan rashin isassun hormones na thyroid yana haifar da jinkirin ayyukan jiki. daya daga cikin alamun da ake gani a gwaje-gwajen jini shine matakin thyroid stimulating hormone (tsh) da aka ɗaukaka, wanda ke nuna cewa jikin yana ƙoƙarin ƙarfafa gland din thyroid don samar da ƙarin hormones.

amsoshin da ba daidai ba:

b. pre-tibial myxoedema - wannan yanayi, wanda ke nuna kumburin fata a gaban ƙafafu, ya fi alaƙa da hyperthyroidism, musamman ma cutar graves, ba hypothyroidism ba.

d. ƙiyayya ga wurare masu ɗumi - mutanen da ke da hypothyroidism galibi sun fi jin daɗin wurare masu ɗumi saboda suna da wahalar dumama jikinsu. sabili da haka, sun fi son zafi fiye da sanyi.

Question:

Question:
Ana amfani da kuɗin gidaje a birni kuma suna da kuɗin $125,000 kuma suna da kuɗin da ya fi $23,000. Domin sabon alkawarin malamai, yankin makaranta yana bukatar ƙarin kuɗi na 10% idan aka gwada da shekara ta dā. Don a tara wannan ƙarin kuɗi, birnin ya umurci ofishin bincike ya tara dukan kuɗin gida da aka tara da $5,000. Menene zai zama sabon ɓata mizanan gidaje da aka yi amfani da su a birnin?
A.$23,000 
B.$25,300 
C.$28,000 
D.$30,300
GivenAnswer:
domin lissafin sabon ɓata mizanan gidaje da aka yi amfani da su a birnin, za mu bi matakan da ke ƙasa:

1. an ce ana buƙatar ƙarin kuɗi na 10% idan aka gwada da shekara ta dā. wannan yana nufin cewa za a ƙara 10% na kuɗin da ake buƙata a halin yanzu ($125,000) don sabon alkawarin malamai.

2. lissafin ƙarin 10% na $125,000:
\[10\% \times \$125,000 = 0.10 \times \$125,000 = \$12,500\]

3. saboda haka, sabon kuɗin da ake buƙata don alkawarin malamai zai zama:
\[\$125,000 + \$12,500 = \$137,500\]

4. an umurci ofishin bincike ya tara dukan kuɗin gida da aka tara da $5,000. wannan yana nufin za a ƙara $5,000 zuwa ga sabon kuɗin da ake buƙata:
\[\$137,500 + \$5,000 = \$142,500\]

5. yanzu, muna da sabon kuɗin da ake buƙata na $142,500. don haka, za mu kwatanta wannan da kuɗin da aka ambata a matsayin kuɗin da ya fi ($23,000) don gano sabon ɓata mizanan gidaje.

tunda babu wani zaɓi da ya dace da lissafinmu na $142,500 (wanda shine jimillar kuɗin da ake buƙata yanzu, ba sabon ɓata mizanan gidaje ba), yana da alama akwai wata matsala a cikin tambayar ko kuma yadda aka fahimci tambayar. tambayar ta nemi sanin sabon ɓata mizanan gidaje da aka yi amfani da su, amma bisa ga bayanin da aka bayar, an yi magana ne game da jimillar kuɗin da ake buƙata don alkawarin malamai da ƙarin kuɗin da za a tara, ba tare da bayyana yadda za a rarraba wannan ƙarin kuɗin a matsayin sabon ɓata mizanan gidaje ba.

idan muka yi la'akari da cewa an yi kuskure a fahimtar tambayar kuma abin da ake nufi shi ne a lissafa ƙarin kuɗin da ake buƙata bisa ga ƙimar da aka bayar ($125,000 da ƙarin 10% da kuma ƙarin $5,000), to, za mu iya cewa babu wani zaɓi da ya dace daidai da wannan lissafin. duk da haka, idan muka yi la'akari da cewa an nemi sabon ɓata mizanan gidaje dangane da ƙarin kuɗin da ake buƙata, za mu buƙaci ƙarin bayani don yin lissafin daidai.

b. tsayayya da sabontawa: communidades de base sun kasance wani bangare na tsayayya da sabontawa a cikin cocin katolika, suna mai da hankali kan aikin zamantakewa da adalci, da kuma kokarin yin canje-canje a cikin al'umma da cocin daga tushe.

c. daraja ga dukan mutane: wannan ra'ayin ya kasance tushe ga ayyukan communidades de base, inda suka mayar da hankali kan koyarwar kristanci ta son juna, taimakon juna, da kuma nuna adalci ga dukkan mutane, musamman ma ga matalauta da marasa galihu.

don haka, communidades de base suna da alaka da dukkan wadannan abubuwan da aka ambata, suna mai da hankali kan hadin kai, adalci, da kuma canji mai ma'ana a cikin al'umma da cocin.

Question:
Wani ma'aikacin babban kamfani na ɗinki ya ga cewa aikin ba shi da sauƙi, kuma yana neman aikin ne kawai don kuɗin. Mai aikin ba ya yin aiki kaɗan, kuma ba ya motsa shi ya yi yawan aiki ko kuma ya fi kyau. Bisa ga ra'ayin F. Herzberg na abubuwa biyu, hanya mafi kyau ta 10 ta ƙara motsin kanka na wannan ma'aikacin ita ce
A.ka ba da ƙarin kuɗi da ƙarfafawa don ƙarin aikin
B.Yi amfani da shi don samar da wani ƙalubale da kuma ra'ayi na ci gaba.
C.ƙara zarafin tattaunawa da mutane da sani
D.Ka ba wa ma'aikacin aiki aiki mai girma
GivenAnswer:
bisa ga ra'ayin f. herzberg na abubuwa biyu, wanda ya raba abubuwan da ke haifar da gamsuwa a wurin aiki (motivators) daga waɗanda ke hana rashin gamsuwa (hygiene factors), hanya mafi kyau ta ƙara motsin kanka na wannan ma'aikacin ita ce:

b. yi amfani da shi don samar da wani ƙalubale da kuma ra'ayi na ci gaba.

wannan saboda herzberg ya gano cewa abubuwan da ke haifar da gamsuwa a wurin aiki (kamar damar ci gaba, aikin kansa, da yabo) sun bambanta da waɗanda ke hana rashin gamsuwa (kamar albashi, yanayin aiki, da tsaro a aiki). don haka, ƙara kuɗi (wanda ke cikin rukunin 'hygiene factors') ba zai haifar da ƙarin gamsuwa ko motsin kai ba a dogon lokaci. maimakon haka, samar da ƙalubale da damar ci gaba (wanda ke cikin rukunin 'motivators') zai fi dacewa wajen ƙarfafa ma'aikacin ya zama mai ƙwazo da gamsuwa a aikinsa.

Question:
Wata mata ' yar shekara 54 ta zo ofishin domin ta ci ciwon hagu da hagu na dama a cikin makonni uku da suka shige. Kowace rashin lafiya tana da tsawon sakan ɗaya ko kashi kashi. Sau da yawa sanyi yana jawo ciwon, yana ɗanɗana, yana motsa ta, kuma yana shafe haƙarunta. Ba ta yi baƙin ciki a fuskarsa ko kuma kanta ba. Tarihi na jinya yana da ban mamaki domin ciwon kan, ƙwanƙwasawa, da fiɗa a ciyawa. Tsawonta santimita 165 ne kuma nauyinta kilo 62 ne. BMI shi ne 23 kg / m2 . Alamar da take da muhimmanci tana da kyau. Mai ciwon ba zai iya ƙyale ta taɓa gefen dama na fuskarsa ba. Ba a raunana fuskarmu ko kuma rashin jin daɗi. Sauran gwajin ba su nuna laifi ba. CT scan na kan da kuma ba tare da bambanci ba ya nuna laifi. Wane irin magani ne ya fi dacewa a wannan lokacin?
A.Carbamazepine
B.Lamotrigine
C.Levetiracetam
D.Topiramate
GivenAnswer:
bayanin da aka bayar ya nuna alamun da suka dace da neuralgia na trigeminal, wanda shine ciwon da ke shafar ɗaya ko fiye da rassan jijiyar fuska (trigeminal nerve). wannan yanayin na iya haifar da zafi mai tsanani da ya shafi gefen fuska, wanda zai iya bayyana a matsayin harbin zafi ko wutar lantarki da ke faruwa ba zato ba tsammani. zafin na iya zama mai tsanani sosai kuma ya faru a cikin kashi-kashi ko sakan.

a. carbamazepine shine maganin farko da aka fi so don magance neuralgia na trigeminal. yana aiki ta hanyar rage ko dakatar da siginar zafi da ke tafiya ta hanyar jijiyoyin da abin ya shafa. an tabbatar da ingancinsa a cikin bincike da yawa kuma ana daukarsa a matsayin zabin farko na magani don wannan yanayin.

b. lamotrigine ana iya amfani da shi a matsayin magani na biyu ko a hade da carbamazepine a wasu lokuta, musamman idan mara lafiya baya amsa da kyau ga carbamazepine ko kuma idan suna da illolin da ba za su iya jurewa ba.

c. levetiracetam ba a saba amfani da shi a matsayin magani na farko ba don neuralgia na trigeminal kuma ba shi da goyon baya mai karfi a cikin littattafai don wannan amfani.

d. topiramate ana iya amfani da shi a matsayin magani na biyu ko na uku don neuralgia na trigeminal, musamman idan wasu magunguna ba su yi aiki ba ko ba za a iya jure su ba.

saboda haka, amsar da ta fi dacewa ita ce:
a. carbamazepine

Question:
A cikin yanayin ci gaba da zama duniya, ta yaya za mu iya fahimtar kalmar nan 'ci gaba'?
A.Kalmar nan ci gaba tana nufin yanayin ' yan Adam inda akwai ' yanci daga tsoro da son kai; Da akwai isashen kuɗi don a ci gaba da rayuwa kuma wannan rayuwa za ta iya kasancewa a cikin yanayi da ba ta da barazana, ko kuma ana ganin cewa za ta iya sa ta daina aiki farat ɗaya.
B.Don a ɗauke shi da ci gaba, dole ne al'umma ta samu wasu matsayi na tattalin arziki da siyasa a tsarin gwamnati ta duniya; Ma'anar abin da ke cikin yanayin 'ci gaba' an bayyana shi ne ta wurin waɗannan bukatun tattaunawa a wannan tsarin.
C.Ci gaba hanya ce ta magance rashin daidaituwar da ke tattare da ci gaban duniya. A wannan yanayin, ci gaba yana nufin iyawar jama'a ko kuma jama'a su yi amfani da kuɗi da kyau kuma su ƙara amfani da kayan aiki da rarraba, suna ɗaukaka rarraba kuɗi daidai a cikin jama'a.
D.Ci gaban jama'a yana nufin tsarin ra'ayi da ɗabi'a da mutanensa suke amincewa da shi. A tsarin ƙasashe da aka yi amfani da shi a dukan duniya, wannan yana nufin yin amfani da ra'ayin ' yan kwaminisanci na yamma da kuma kasuwanci na ' yanci.
GivenAnswer:
fahimtar kalmar "ci gaba" a cikin yanayin ci gaba da zama duniya yana buƙatar duba daga matakai da dama, kuma kowace daga cikin zaɓuɓɓukan da aka bayar suna ɗauke da wani ɓangare na gaskiya game da yadda duniya ke fahimtar ci gaba. duk da haka, babu wanda daga cikinsu ke bayar da cikakken bayani game da ma'anar ci gaba a dukkanin fannoni. bari mu duba su ɗaya bayan ɗaya:

a. wannan bayanin yana magana ne game da 'yanci daga tsoro da son kai, da samun isasshen kuɗi don rayuwa mai inganci, da kuma rayuwa a cikin yanayi mara barazana. wannan fahimta ta ci gaba tana mai da hankali ne kan 'yancin ɗan adam da kuma ingancin rayuwa, wanda ke da muhimmanci amma ba ya rufe dukkanin fannoni na ci gaba.

b. anan, an danganta ci gaba da samun wasu matsayi na tattalin arziki da siyasa a tsarin gwamnati ta duniya. wannan fahimtar tana mai da hankali ne kan buƙatun tattaunawa da matsayi a tsakanin al'ummomi a matakin duniya, wanda shi ma wani ɓangare ne na ci gaba amma ba ya bayyana dukkanin abubuwan da ke cikin ci gaba.

c. wannan bayanin yana magance rashin daidaituwa ta hanyar inganta amfani da kuɗi da albarkatu, da ƙara ingancin rarraba kuɗi a cikin jama'a. wannan fahimtar ta ci gaba tana mai da hankali ne kan tattalin arziki da adalci a rarraba albarkatu, wanda ke da muhimmanci amma kuma ɓangare ɗaya ne kawai na ci gaba.

d. anan, an bayyana ci gaba a matsayin tsarin ra'ayi da ɗabi'a da ake amincewa da shi, yana mai da hankali ne kan yin amfani da ra'ayoyin kwaminisanci na yamma da kasuwanci na 'yanci. wannan fahimtar tana magana ne game da tsarin siyasa da tattalin arziki, amma ba ta shafi dukkanin fannoni na ci gaba.

a ƙarshe, ci gaba a cikin yanayin ci gaba da zama duniya yana buƙatar fahimtar da ta haɗa da ingancin rayuwa, 'yancin ɗan adam, adalci a rarraba albarkatu, da kuma ci gaban tattalin arziki da siyasa. dole ne a yi la'akari da waɗannan dukkanin fannoni don samun cikakken fahimtar abin da ci gaba ke nufi a duniyar yau.
